content: I am an passionate agricultural economist and a Ph.D. candidate at University of California, Davis. My research interests lies in the intersection of agricultural policy and rural development, with a special focus on the organization of modern agricultural supply chains. I am now working under the guidance of Prof. Richard J. Sexton and Prof. Rachael E. Goodhue.
